feed.title: Crossing the line? [Was: Re: Let's deploy BIP65 CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY!]

entry.title: Crossing the line? [Was: Re: Let's deploy BIP65 CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY!]
entry.summary: The ongoing discussion on Reddit has led to the suggestion of a cooling-off period before any further action is taken. It is being debated whether Mike Hearn has crossed the line in terms of his posting and actions, with some feeling that he has done so multiple times. However, there are those who believe that no action should be taken by any undefined community, as they do not agree with TaoEffect.com (aka "PRIVATE REGISTRANT") and therefore there is no consensus.
